about.title: About
about.one: Multicycles is an application that allows you to group together at a glance the different bicycle rental services (bicycle-sharing system) and other shared vehicles.
about.two: Use of the application is free and open-source (https://github.com/PierrickP/multicycles)
about.three:
Launched in early 2018, few services are available, but the list is growing steadily.
You can contact the initiator of the project on twitter
about.four: Interested by data ? The API is available as a service. More information on https://developer.multicycles.org/

account.title: My Account
account.intro: Combine all your accounts in a single application. Link your accounts to take full advantage of Multicycles. You'll never have to switch from one app to another to find the right vehicle for you again.

LinkSubaccountModal.title: Login and link my {provider} account
LinkSubaccountModal.limeStep1: To link your Lime account, set your phone number. You ll receive a message with a password. Please use internationnal format.
LinkSubaccountModal.limeStep2: Put the received code number on you phone.
LinkSubaccountModal.birdStep1: To link your Bird account, set your email. You ll receive a message with a token at the bottom.
LinkSubaccountModal.birdStep2: Put the token received by email
